verses.name: Joshua 11:16
verses.text: So Joshua took all that land, the hills, and all the south country, and all the land of Goshen, and the valley, and the plain, and the mountain of Israel, and the valley of the same;

verses.name: Joshua 11:17
verses.text: Even from the mount Halak, that goeth up to Seir, even unto Baal–gad in the valley of Lebanon under mount Hermon: and all their kings he took, and smote them, and slew them.

verses.name: Joshua 11:18
verses.text: Joshua made war a long time with all those kings.
